md:
giải nghĩa từ "lasted" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Lasted (verb)
	* Meaning: to continue to exist or have an effect for a certain amount of time
	* Vietnamese: kéo dài, tồn tại
	* Example: The party lasted until midnight.
	* Related words: last, duration, persist

2. Lasted (verb)
	* Meaning: to be enough for a certain amount of time
	* Vietnamese: đủ dùng, kéo dài
	* Example: The food lasted us for three days.
	* Related words: last, sufficient, endure

3. Lasted (verb)
	* Meaning: to be strong or healthy enough to continue doing something
	* Vietnamese: đủ sức, kéo dài
	* Example: She lasted through the difficult project.
	* Related words: last, withstand, persevere

Note: The verb "lasted" is often used in the past tense to indicate that something continued to exist or have an effect for a certain amount of time.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "lasted" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Lasted (verb)

    • Meaning: to continue to exist or have an effect for a certain amount of time
    • Vietnamese: kéo dài, tồn tại
    • Example: The party lasted until midnight.
    • Related words: last, duration, persist

  2. Lasted (verb)

    • Meaning: to be enough for a certain amount of time
    • Vietnamese: đủ dùng, kéo dài
    • Example: The food lasted us for three days.
    • Related words: last, sufficient, endure

  3. Lasted (verb)

    • Meaning: to be strong or healthy enough to continue doing something
    • Vietnamese: đủ sức, kéo dài
    • Example: She lasted through the difficult project.
    • Related words: last, withstand, persevere

Note: The verb "lasted" is often used in the past tense to indicate that something continued to exist or have an effect for a certain amount of time.
